mapper.select: SELECT uid, station_name, lat, lon, size, is_valid, station_type, COUNT(case when b.bike_type='general' then 1 end) AS general_cnt, COUNT(case when b.bike_type='sprout' then 1 end) AS sprout_cnt FROM station AS s JOIN bike AS b ON b.station_uid = s.uid WHERE s.uid = #{station_uid} AND b.status_ = 'ready' GROUP BY s.uid

SELECT uid, station_name, lat, lon, size, is_valid, station_type, COUNT(case when b.bike_type='general' then 1 end) AS general_cnt, COUNT(case when b.bike_type='sprout' then 1 end) AS sprout_cnt, f.user_uid, f.created_date FROM station_favorite AS f JOIN station AS s ON f.station_uid = s.uid JOIN bike AS b ON b.station_uid = s.uid WHERE s.station_type='lent' AND b.status_ = 'ready' AND f.user_uid = #{user_uid} GROUP BY s.uid

SELECT uid, station_name, lat, lon, size, is_valid, station_type, COUNT(case when b.bike_type='general' then 1 end) AS general_cnt, COUNT(case when b.bike_type='sprout' then 1 end) AS sprout_cnt FROM station AS s JOIN bike AS b ON b.station_uid = s.uid WHERE s.station_type='lent' AND b.status_ = 'ready'
AND s.station_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{station_name}, '%')
GROUP BY s.uid

SELECT uid, station_name, lat, lon, size, is_valid, station_type, COUNT(case when b.bike_type='general' then 1 end) AS general_cnt, COUNT(case when b.bike_type='sprout' then 1 end) AS sprout_cnt FROM station AS s JOIN bike AS b ON b.station_uid = s.uid WHERE s.station_type='lent' AND b.status_ = 'ready' AND s.lat > #{y1} AND s.lat < #{y2} AND s.lon > #{x1} AND s.lon < #{x2} GROUP BY s.uid
